name: William Russell Flint - W. S. Gilbert - Savoy Operas - Princess Ida 5 (Frontispiece) - Original scan

desc.html:
Frontispiece to Savoy Operas, an illustration to Princess Ida:

"If it be well to droop and pine and mope,
To sigh, 'Oh, Ida! Ida!' all day long,
Then Prince Hilarion is very well."

In the book's "List of Illustrations", this is given as the fifth illustration for Princess Ida, due to its chronological order within the play itself.
